name: Swaave
description: contract that batches ETH and SUSHI staking into Aave xSUSHI (aXSUSHI).

functionDecorators.name: saave
functionDecorators.description: stake SUSHI `amount` into aXSUSHI by batching calls to `sushiBar` and `aave` lending pool.

functionDecorators.name: saaveTo
functionDecorators.description: stake SUSHI `amount` into aXSUSHI for benefit of `to` by batching calls to `sushiBar` and `aave` lending pool.

functionDecorators.name: swaave
functionDecorators.description: stake ETH `msg.value` into aXSUSHI by batching calls to `sushiSwapRouter`, `sushiBar` and `aave` lending pool.

functionDecorators.name: swaaveTo
functionDecorators.description: stake ETH `msg.value` into aXSUSHI for benefit of `to` by batching calls to `sushiSwapRouter`, `sushiBar` and `aave` lending pool.

functionDecorators.name: unSaave
functionDecorators.description: unstake aXSUSHI `amount` into SUSHI by batching calls to `aave` lending pool and `sushiBar`.

functionDecorators.name: unSaaveTo
functionDecorators.description: unstake aXSUSHI `amount` into SUSHI for benefit of `to` by batching calls to `aave` lending pool and `sushiBar`.

functionDecorators.name: unSwaave
functionDecorators.description: unstake aXSUSHI `amount` into ETH by batching calls to `aave` lending pool, `sushiBar` and `sushiSwapRouter`.

functionDecorators.name: unSwaaveTo
functionDecorators.description: unstake aXSUSHI `amount` into ETH for benefit of `to` by batching calls to `aave` lending pool, `sushiBar` and `sushiSwapRouter`.
